name: CloudStorageManager
description: Manages files and folders in cloud storage services. Supports Google Drive and OneDrive.
author: ApexAgent Team

actions.name: list_files
actions.description: Lists files and folders in a specified path on the cloud storage service.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the folder to list. Defaults to root if not provided.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

returns.description: List of file/folder objects with details like name, id, type, size, last_modified

actions.name: upload_file
actions.description: Uploads a local file to the specified cloud storage service.

parameters.name: local_file_path
parameters.description: Absolute path of the local file to upload

parameters.name: destination_folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the destination folder on cloud storage. Defaults to root if not provided.

parameters.name: file_name_on_cloud
parameters.description: Optional name for the file on cloud storage. Defaults to local file name.

actions.name: download_file
actions.description: Downloads a file from the cloud storage service to a local path.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: ID of the file to download from cloud storage

parameters.name: local_save_path
parameters.description: Absolute local path (including filename) to save the downloaded file

actions.name: delete_file
actions.description: Deletes a file or folder from the cloud storage service.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: ID of the file or folder to delete

actions.name: create_folder
actions.description: Creates a new folder on the cloud storage service.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: Name of the folder to create

parameters.name: parent_folder_id
parameters.description: ID of the parent folder. Defaults to root if not provided.

actions.name: get_file_metadata
actions.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific file or folder.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: ID of the file or folder

returns.description: File/folder metadata object or null if not found
